Text: Need A Little HelpMike This is Nick Monteleone old baseball buddy I spoke with you when yall came to LSU for the information session and reception at Mike Andersons Hopefully you remember my situation so I wont get into all those details I thought I would send you a copy of my resume Maybe you could get it to a recuiter or someone with the decision making power Thats all I just need an upper hand instead of using all this database resume submission Dont go through a lot of trouble at all just maybe hand it to someone that makes the decisions And if you cant that is fine too I just wanted to give it a shot Thank you for the assistance Mike Drop me an email from time to time and let me know how things are going Bye Mike Sincerely NICK MONTELEONE
